mlptrain.potentials.mace.mace

class mlptrain.potentials.mace.mace.MACE(name: str, system: System)

Bases: MLPotential

@DynamicAttrs

property args: Namespace

Namespace containing mostly default MACE parameters

property ase_calculator: Calculator

ASE calculator for MACE potential

property atomic_energies_array: ndarray

List of atomic energies of the system

property avg_num_neighbors: float

Average number of neighbors in the training set

property checkpoint_handler: mace.tools.CheckpointHandler

Checkpoint handler to use in training

property config_type_weights: Dict

Dictionary containing the weights for each configuration type

property device: torch.device

Device to use for training

property ema: torch_ema.ExponentialMovingAverage | None

Object for exponantial moving average during training

property filename: str

Name of the file where potential is stored

property loss_fn: torch.nn.Module

Loss function to use in the training

property max_num_epochs: int

Maximum number of epochs to perform during training

property model: torch.nn.Module

Torch Module to use in training

property opt_param_options: Dict

Dictionary with optimiser parameter options

property optimizer: torch.optim.Optimizer

Optimizer to use in training

property output_args: Dict

Dictionary containing required outputs

property requires_atomic_energies: bool

Does this potential need E_0s for each atom to be specified

property requires_non_zero_box_size: bool

MACE cannot use a zero size box

property scheduler: torch.optim.lr_scheduler

Torch scheduler for training

setup_logger() → None

Set up a MACE logger

property start_epoch: int

Start epoch of the training

property swa: mace.tools.SWAContainer | None

Object for stochastic weight averaging during training

property train_batch_size: int

Batch size of the training set

property train_configs: mace.data.Configurations

Configurations in the training dataset

property train_loader: mace.tools.torch_geometric.dataloader.DataLoader

Torch dataloader with training configurations

property valid_batch_size: int

Batch size of the validation set

property valid_configs: mace.data.Configurations

Configurations in the validation dataset

property valid_fraction: float

Fraction of the whole dataset to be used as validation set

property valid_loader: mace.tools.torch_geometric.dataloader.DataLoader

Torch dataloader with validation configurations

property z_table: mace.tools.AtomicNumberTable

Table containing atomic numbers of the system

property z_table_symbol: List[str]

List of chemical symbols of the system
